name: places/ChIJjwBdZMJYwokRj9yZXFim_ho
adrFormatAddress: 1235 1st Ave., New York, NY 10065-6311, USA

originalText.text: Remarkable pharmacy run by fantastic people.  It’s rare to encounter people in NYC so enthusiastically willing to help strangers during difficult times.  10 stars for David and his team.  Thank you.

text.text: Remarkable pharmacy run by fantastic people.  It’s rare to encounter people in NYC so enthusiastically willing to help strangers during difficult times.  10 stars for David and his team.  Thank you.

originalText.text:
Instead of showering Vitahealth with (well-deserved) praise -- which of course they have long earned many times over -- I will relay in writing the verbal exchanges that I had with them just yesterday.  Neither will even remotely remind you of... any conversations that you may have had with a pharmacist or staff anywhere else:

ME (pointing to a list in my hand):
We are going out of the country, and I really need all of these things, including some prescription meds.

DAVID (carefully reading the list):
We can have all of these ready for you. Don’t worry.

I returned to the pharmacy later in the afternoon, and walked up to the counter.

ME:   Am I too....early ?

IGOR (handing me two small plastic bags):
Here you go !

ME:  Fabulous. Thank you so much! You’ll charge my card; right ?

So in case you didn’t know; I’m a Big Fan of Vitahealth.

originalText.text: Great customer service and very cordial

text.text: Great customer service and very cordial

originalText.text: Excellent independent pharmacy. Extremely knowledgeable staff. More like a Euopean style pharmacy where you can get advice. Delivery available all over the city. Quality products at good prices. I would highly recommend Vitahealth if you are looking for a full service drugstore.

text.text: Excellent independent pharmacy. Extremely knowledgeable staff. More like a Euopean style pharmacy where you can get advice. Delivery available all over the city. Quality products at good prices. I would highly recommend Vitahealth if you are looking for a full service drugstore.

originalText.text: Best pharmacy in the world!!  David, the owner/Pharmacist, is the most knowledgeable, caring, smart, helpful person and there isn't anything he doesn't know or can't help you with. He always takes the time to talk to you and recommend what is needed. This isn't about just medication. David has a wealth of knowledge with supplements, interactions, diseases, etc.  Who else could possibly help you with this? The staff really knows their business and are so helpful.  This is what pharmacies were like way back when. Best prices, service, they deliver and ship anywhere.
